description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Are you smarter than a cheerleader?  Find out as you compete against cheerleaders in a battle of knowledge across 15 categories.
description.short: Are you smarter than a cheerleader?  Find out as you compete against cheerleaders in a battle of knowledge across 15 categories.
